title: ABCS
desc:
Post 735
- Flip cards to their b-side, if they have any.
- Cards in your hand which are already b-side instead flip to their c-side. The host creates new C-side colors and cards for this occasion.
- C-side cards flip back to their default form.
- (B-sides are colors which occur when a card is flipped. For example, green is flipped to its b-side of Cyan, along with a random green card converted to cyan. The host improvises these rules)
